unnormalised: Crop insurance, huh? Needed more than ever with unpredictable rains! Farmers in Vidarbha are suffering. Heard the Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helped Ramlal in his village near Nagpur after the floods of 20/07/2023. But paperwork is a killer! Hope they simplify the process. Application deadline is 31/08/2024 at 17:00 hrs, says the Krishi Vigyan Kendra. Even after payout delays... last year around Diwali time. Rs. 5000/acre is better than nothing, I guess! Jai Kisan!
normalised: Crop insurance, huh? Needed more than ever with unpredictable rains! Farmers in Vidarbha are suffering. Heard the Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helped Ramlal in his village near Nagpur after the floods of twentieth july two thousand and twenty three. But paperwork is a killer! Hope they simplify the process. Application deadline is thirty first august two thousand and twenty four at five PM, says the Krishi Vigyan Kendra. Even after payout delays... last year around Diwali time. Rupees five thousand per acre is better than nothing, I guess! Jai Kisan!
